# trss-banner

The banner shows across the width of a page. It appears when the domain is listed on an approved list and there is information to share with site visitors.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property     | Attribute    | Description                               | Type     | Default     |
| ------------ | ------------ | ----------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `appearance` | `appearance` | This sets the color scheme for the alert. | `string` | `'blue'`    |
| `header`     | `header`     | The text for the headline of the alert.   | `string` | `undefined` |
